Romantic Europe | Insight Vacations | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Romantic European 18 Days | Amsterdam to Paris Uncover Europe’s most enchanting cities on a curated journey through Amsterdam, Venice, Vienna, and beyond. Savor sunset cocktails in Venice’s St. Mark’s Square, cruise the Danube by night in Budapest, and explore Prague with exclusive Insight Choice experiences. From Roman ruins to Alpine vistas, this is Europe at its most inspiring—rich in culture, history, and unforgettable moments. Deal Details Travel Dates March - June 2026 Priced From $12,440 Enquire Now Description Uncover Europe’s most enchanting cities on a curated journey through Amsterdam, Venice, Vienna, and beyond. Savor sunset cocktails in Venice’s St. Mark’s Square, cruise the Danube by night in Budapest, and explore Prague with exclusive Insight Choice experiences. From Roman ruins to Alpine vistas, this is Europe at its most inspiring—rich in culture, history, and unforgettable moments. Highlights Venice Artisan Glassblowing Demonstration Witness the ancient skill of glassblowing, now practised by precious few masters. Watch artisans create delicate works of art using rare traditional practices. The workshop's master craftsmen teach visitors about the traditional craft of glassblowing and its history which dates back to the 15th century. Every visit helps to support the workshop and the survival of this traditional craft. Mount Stanserhorn Experience Journey to the top of Mount Stanserhorn on a panoramic, open-top cable car powered by solar energy, and enjoy spectacular views from the summit. Walk along beautiful scenic pathways, keeping an eye out for marmots and other native animals, with the chance to hear a conservation talk by a Swiss ranger, to learn about local wildlife and flora. Private Recital at Budapest's Liszt Academy of Music Meet your local host for a guided tour through the house of the Italian Renaissance diplomat and writer, Nicolo Machiavelli, with an included special opening of his private office where he wrote 'The Prince'. Visit the Italian garden and the historic cellar, which has a secret underground tunnel connecting the cellars to the oldest restaurant in Italy. Savour a tasting of wines made from the vineyards surrounding the home, accompanied by delicious samples of local Tuscan fare. Pricing 19 Days from $12,440* per person, twin share Based on 09 August 2026 Departure Inclusions 18 Nights Handpicked 4 & 5 star hotels in great locations Superior dining in top rated restaurants Daily breakfasts | 6 Dinners | 2 Lunches Many relaxed morning starts after 9am 24/7 personal service – knowledgeable Travel Director & expert Driver ‘Business Class’ style coaches with extended legroom* Insider Access, Insightful Encounters and Insight Choice experiences Local discovery led by Local Experts Porterage, plus tips and gratuities at hotels and restaurants, is included Itinerary details Day 1 Arrive Amsterdam Day 2 Amsterdam - Wurzburg Day 3 Wurzburg - Rothenburg ob der Tauber - Prague Day 4 Prague Day 5 Prague - Budapest Day 6 Budapest Day 7 Budapest - Vienna Day 8 Vienna Day 9 Vienna - Venice Day 10 Venice Day 11 Venice - Tuscany - Rome Day 12 Rome - Vatican City - Rome Day 13 Rome - Umbria - Florence Day 14 Florence Day 15 Florence - Lucerne Day 16 Lucerne - Stanserhorn - Lucerne Day 17 Lucerne - Paris Day 18 Paris Day 19 Au Revoir Paris Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD (unless specified otherwise) per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, processing fees apply. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable for Insight Vacations. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
